meanings.definition: A unit of currency in various countries, equal to one hundredth of a pound.
meanings.sent1: In some countries, people use piasters to buy things like food and clothes.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for piasters when I traveled to that country.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was so full of piasters that it almost burst!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny piasters, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of piasters jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: I found a piaster in the couch cushions while cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepted exact change, so I used a piaster.
meanings.sent3: The piaster rolled off the table and into the cat's toy box.
meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up when he saw the rare piaster in his collection.
meanings.sent5: The piaster gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
